function.name: set_reminder
function.description: Set a reminder using the 'at' command. The 'time' parameter should be in a format acceptable to the 'at' command (e.g., 'now + 1 minute', '10:30 PM tomorrow'). The reminder will be sent as a desktop notification.

time.description: The time to set the reminder, in a format compatible with the 'at' command.
